messages.message: hey team, is there a way to run golden-tests on a sandbox? seems like the command in this Confluence page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/1577746467/Golden+Test-Runner+Framework) can only be run on dogfood/uat/prod
Cc @Aayush we do have golden setup running for the release sandboxes
ahh i see, what about a dev sandbox?
I think the setup is the same but I am unsure if the confluence page is up to date

You can find setup information in this doc
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Tvn9KgBnGqAdTfUDDSmsWmeeWoeF_GKdoQmqj0QiWu4/edit?usp=sharing (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Tvn9KgBnGqAdTfUDDSmsWmeeWoeF_GKdoQmqj0QiWu4/edit?usp=sharing)
Also, we have an upcoming feature to automatically set up the sandbox for goldens with a button click which @Rahul Rawal is working on!
Ahhh thank you! Looking forward to using the new feature :blob_excited:
